    async def wrap_api_call(
        self, cb: Callable[[], Any], is_internal: bool = False
    ) -> Any:
        if self._api_zone.get():
            return await cb()
        task = asyncio.current_task(self._loop)

        parsed_st = _extract_stack_trace_information_from_stack(st, is_internal)
        self._api_zone.set(parsed_st)
        try:
            return await cb()

    async def do_publish(self):
        """
        发布任务，如果获取登录状态失败，则重试
        """
        try:
            async for attempt in AsyncRetrying(
                    stop=stop_after_attempt(
                        LoginLocator.login_chk_retry_cnt),
                    wait=wait_fixed(LoginLocator.login_chk_interval),
                    retry=retry_if_exception_type(PlwTimeoutError),
                    before_sleep=before_sleep_log(self._logger, logging.WARNING)):
                with attempt:
                    async with async_playwright() as playwright:
                        await self.publish_mission(playwright)
        except Exception as ex:
            self._logger.exception('❌❌❌《%s》发布异常', self._publish_title)
>           raise PublishFail(original_exception=ex) from ex
